captions.text: Why are you talking so weird?
- This is pretty scary, you guys.

- This is nuts.
- This is B.S.
Not everyone is getting married, you guys.
- He hadn't even been to a strip club yet.
- I don't want to buy a wedding gift,
or an engagement gift, it's too expensive.

- [Woman in Glasses]
I'm losing my friends,
I feel like I'm going crazy, I'm so alone.

- Do you think Zach's been
acting kind of strange?
- Hold on babe, I've gotta tie my shoe.
No no no no, this isn't mine.

- [Zach] Are we gonna
have to do the Macarena

at the reception?
- [Man] I don't know!
- [Zach] I don't know how to do...
